Reviews.Title: “Convenient for some maybe... but not for cruises”
Reviews.Author: iloveclubmed
Reviews.Content: I had two requirements for booking our pre-cruise hotel in Miami: it had to have a separate bedroom from the living room (my husband and I were travelling with my parents and we required some level of privacy) and it had to be convienent to the airport and to the cruise port. We checked in around 2am due to delayed flights and a long baggage wait in Miami. The taxi attendant at the airport chose a van for us, which turned out to be un-metered. If it wasn't so late at night and we weren't so exhausted and miserable, I would have requested a different van. We had a gut feeling we were getting hosed when the driver quoted us $55 for the ride to the hotel, but were too tired and inexperienced with Miami and the area to make a fuss. (Later I found out it should have only cost around $35). The fellow who checked us in was friendly enough and efficient. When I went to purchase a bottle of water from the vending machine and discovered that the entire machine was out of stock of everything, I enquired with the front desk about alternatives and he very kindly provided us with complimentary small bottles of water. Nice touch. I booked a one bedroom suite, with a pull out couch in the living room. My parents got the bedroom and said it was quite comfortable. However, the pull out couch was the worst I have ever had the displeasure of "sleeping" on. All wires and coils and very little mattress. My husband and I kept rolling into each other in the middle. The bathtub/shower was in the bedroom and had a tall and wide side to climb over to get into. If you have limited mobility it would have been very difficult as it was very awkward. Breakfast was okay. A couple of cereal choices (raisin bran, rice krispies and fruit loops), bread to make toast, yogurt, some yucky looking patties of egg and sausage. The highlight was probably the make-your-own waffles. But with the line-up of people wanting that, I didn't have time to try it. It was difficult to get a taxi to take us to the port due to the distance of the hotel from the airport (where there are always taxis in the neighbourhood). It took an hour for one to arrive after calling and cost about $35 if memory serves. Overall I'd say this was an average hotel, but for meeting my two requirements I have to give it a thumbs down. The pull out couch was a nightmare and the distance from the airport and the port make it very inconvenient. Google map it before booking and expect to pay high taxi fares to/from, as obviously other reviewers who rate this hotel as being convenient for cruises have very different ideas of what that means. The hotel we stayed in post-cruise was a much better option for our needs (Hyatt House Miami Airport).

Reviews.Title: “Clean, nice amenities, soft beds”
Reviews.Author: Abby A
Reviews.Content: We like a firmer mattress. Otherwise, a good experience. Friendly staff at check-in, nice amenities in the room, decent price.

Reviews.Title: “beautiful and friendly”
Reviews.Author: johnfonseca
Reviews.Content: The 2 young women clerks were delightful and welcoming. The lighting above the table was nice for working. The pool was warm and pretty clean. The exercise room is awesome. In the morning i was greated by Eva.she was very kind and helpful asisting with breakfast. i would highly recomend this location to anyone visiting Kendal. thank you so much.

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't Ask For More”
Reviews.Author: nworock
Reviews.Content: Only had one night in Miami after a cruise, and booked here because of the decent prices compared to a lot of other Miami hotels. Really was a great stay even if it was short. Room was big and very clean with everything nice and very new looking. Hot tub and pool were clean and open later than a lot of hotels which was great. Free breakfast was excellent, great selection of cold and hot foods. WiFi connection was one of the best we've ever had in a hotel, very good speeds. Only minus, and it was a minor one, was the distance from Miami Beach. It's about a 25 minute drive, but it's pretty much all freeway so it feels fast at least. But all the ammenities you could ask for are very close by. Really though, can't imagine anything being better anywhere at this price range in the Miami area. Can't recommend enough.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, convenient”
Reviews.Author: peachesrsweet
Reviews.Content: this was a good choice for my overnight stay, prior to an early morning flight from mia. airport transportation was efficient, and the hotel was quite comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Great Price”
Reviews.Author: malm
Reviews.Content: Clean and comfortable, ample parking with great location near stores, eating and shops. Breakfast OK, adequate. Good coffee! This is an older hotel, but has been maintained and updated. Sink area is right as you come in the door, so can be difficult getting by at times. Would like to have seen storage shelves under sink to get everything off the counter - coffee pot and ice bucket tray left little room for personal belongings. Soft towels in adequate number.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort as promised !”
Reviews.Author: 1NONLY
Reviews.Content: This little hotel provided the comfort as promised. Ample free parking on a little shopping estate with some eateries / takeaways and CVS pharmacy and Publix food mart onsite. Front desk service was helpful and complimentary breakfast was quite adequate . Complimentary wifi was a bonus but the reception was better when we were in the separate sitting room/ lounge of our suite. A very spacious and large suite with small kitchenette / microwave and kitchen table for 2. TV in the bedroom and in the lounge. Large safety box and large spa- jacuzzi bath ( with shower over ). The bath was in the same room as the beds. There was a separate room for the toilet and sinks.

Reviews.Title: “I'll tell the truth”
Reviews.Author: B S
Reviews.Content: Upon arriving to this hotel, I was a bit skeptical. But after I entered my room, I was at ease. The hotel was clean and quiet. The room had a microwave, refrigerator, safe, and even a whirlpool. The hotel was conveniently located near Florida International University, where I was meeting a client and some students. I slept comfortably and the breakfast was okay. The staff was courteous but not as concerned or empathetic as I would have liked. (I'll explain) I woke up the next morning searching for my phone. I figured it had fallen through the crack of the mattress and the headboard. I reached down to discover all types of hidden treasures (not really). First I pulled up an old remote, which lead me to believe that they do not normally check the head of the beds because the room had a new remote. Next, I touched something that felt like satin. I immediately pulled the bed back and to my disgust I found a pair of panties (I would upload a picture but I don't want to offend anyone. I have one available by request.) How gross was that? I informed the hotel staff and they didn't seem the least bit alarmed or concerned. One of the receptionist even made an excuse saying the the cleaning person probably couldn't move the bed. I informed her that I, a very petite lady who barely weighs 120 lbs, had no trouble moving it so I don't see anyone else having a problem. She offered to send someone to clean the room, but I informed her I was checking out in a couple of hours so it was unnecessary. It kind of left a bad taste in my mouth. I kept thinking: 1) the room should've been thoroughly examined upon my arrival and 2) what if the person wearing those underwear last was infected by something. What offended me most is I have yet to receive a formal apology. I liked the hotel up until that point. Hopefully, your experience much more pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay again”
Reviews.Author: luiskv
Reviews.Content: Stayed there pre-cruise for 2 nights with my wife and 2 kids. We arrived in an arly flight and they allowed us an early check and breakfat at 8am. Location is very convenient, hotel staff is great, very attentive and helpful. The hotel is clean and well taken care of, breakfast is ok. I've been in several Choice Hotels but this one is by far the best... Will definitely stay there in our next trip to Miami.

Reviews.Title: “No roomsaver coupon”
Reviews.Author: Nancy M
Reviews.Content: Coupon said $89 but manager wanted $145. Stated it is up to them. I did exactly as the ad said but he would not budge. Then the room safe did not work and the pool was closed. Not a great area.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: melker22
Reviews.Content: Clean large rooms, comfortable bed, laundry facilities (on two floors), pool, gym, breakfast (including eggs and fruit), refrigerator, safe... great price. We were concerned about the location and that's the only downside. BUT as you really need to rent a car in Miami, everything is easily accessible including South Beach, the Everglades - the Turnpike, the airport, etc. Next to the hotel (walking) you'll find a Publix supermarket, a CVS drugstore, a liquor store, etc. etc. The neighborhood is Spanish speaking and that has an upside: Sergios - a really decent Cuban restaurant - the real thing!

Reviews.Title: “A nice play to stay in Miami”
Reviews.Author: Th3Tr4v3ll3r
Reviews.Content: I decided to stay at the Comfort Suites after reading the reviews here on TripAdvisor and I'm very glad I made â€‹â€‹that decision. The hotel is really good. There is free parking, a gas station opposite the hotel, several dining options and a supermarket nearby, and the region seemed to be very quiet. There are electronic safes in the rooms. The breakfast is not amazing but it's enough for those who are just looking for a good morning snack. The staff were all friendly and helpful. The rooms were large and clean. I have no complaints. The only "problem" is that the hotel is relatively far from Miami Beach. So those who are looking for fun in that region may be disappointed with the distance.

Reviews.Title: “Good solid hotel”
Reviews.Author: Houndsbaseballfan
Reviews.Content: Even though the hotel was a little west of Miami proper, it had easy access to the Turnpike that made it a good overall location for us. And the cost was modest compared to many hotels in the center of Miami. The service was good, even though I would have liked a little more variety in the breakfast. Our room was relatively quiet even though we were right across from the elevator. Overall, it met our needs without busting our budget. The beds were very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Adequate accommodation”
Reviews.Author: Jonocain
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel for four days from 18th January 2012 prior to going on a cruise. The hotel is 13 miles from Miami International airport and 20 miles from South beach. We decided to use public transport to get around as you can travel quite cheapley a day ticket will cost you $5.00 a day. There is not a lot to do close to the hotel there is a small shopping mall. The hotel is clean and tidy but dated. The staff are nice and helpful. There is an outdoor swimming pool and fitness suite. They do have laundry facilities that we found useful. To sum up if you want to be close to the beach and downtime Miami this is not the best location to be staying but otherwise we had a good stay the breakfasts are good but it's paper plates and plastic cutlery and there is no bar.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: RegionalSalesManager
Reviews.Content: For work I travel 50% of the time and stay at many, many motels. I stayed five nights at this Comfort Suites and found the motel to be all I could hope for it to be. Good standard breakfast, nice large rooms and the staff was very accomidating to my business needs. I will stay here again when I am back in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Whew - glad I picked this hotel based on Tripadvisor reviews”
Reviews.Author: For2une
Reviews.Content: Needing a one night hotel before a cruise out of Miami was a difficult search using my favorite tool - Tripadvisor reviews - to find a good hotel. I prefer under $100 hotels with good reviews however in the Miami area it seemed all hotels in that price range had somewhat scary reviews about the quality of the hotels, service and/or the neighborhood - such as crime. I picked Comfort Suites because it seemed to be one of the lowest price hotels that had great reviews. It turned out to be a good decision and I was satified in this case to pay $144 for the night using Comfort Suites web site and early payment. For the area it seemed a reasonably good value and it was a very nice hotel and one night stay. The standard room was a true suite with a sitting area with couch table and chair and wired and wireless internet. Good furnishings and very comfortable beds gave us a great night's sleep. The room had a nce flat screen TV and large selection of stations, good amenities, a refrigerator - pretty much everything you could need or expect in a qulity room. The free breafast included do-it-yourself waffles, also very nicely done scrambled eggs that were not wet and browned sausage as well as cereals, bagels, oatmeal, juices, etc. Coffe and tea are available 24 hours as well as in room coffee makers. The front desk staff was friendly and efficient and made us a restaurant recommendation - Sergios for Cuban food - that gave us one of the best meals ever and at very low prices for dinner. I also posted a review of Sergios. The hotel is at the edge of a shopping center with a CVS Drug Store and a Publix grocery store where we bought our "take aboard" wine for our cruise. Comfort Suites provided a great one night stay in Miami. It looks like hotels in the area are expensive. I felt this hotel was a good deal at $144 and it did not have any of the problems I read about in reviews of lesser priced hotels in the area. Everything was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort and helpful”
Reviews.Author: phdhonda
Reviews.Content: I agree with most of reviews about this hotel. What lacks about structure compensates with good will from the employees. There's no room for leaving the luggages while travelling to another cities and coming back but the reception helped fitting them behind the desk. Rooms not renewd, but with enough space, with two queen beds and a couch that turns out a bed. Mattress maybe too soft and free wireless internet (good speed) at the whole hotel. If you need a laundry, stay at rooms 402 or 502; they're just beside it and you hear no sound of the machines working. About the lack of space for breakfast, there's no other option than waking up early (before 8am) to get seated. It's really far from the beaches and you must get on the road in the morning or you'll be stucked on your way to Miami beach and downtown. The way back is a lot easier. About shopping, it's close to the Dolphin Mall and there's one Best Buy, Target and Red Lobster Restaurant at SW 88th street (5 minutes distance by car). It's closer to the Sawgrass Mills Mall than if you're located at Miami downtown. Last tip: give a try at the Nunzio's italian restaurant across the parking area (there's no dining at the hotel) with nice food and good prices.

Reviews.Title: “Return Every Winter”
Reviews.Author: Dina S
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel every year for the past three years. The General Manager, Mr. Espinal and the DOS, Mr. Vaca are in the lobby greating their guest and insuring you have the best possible stay. The hotel is always clean and well maintained. The staff is friendly and I have no reservation recommending this hotel to others.

Reviews.Title: “good quality/price ratio”
Reviews.Author: Sticasale
Reviews.Content: we were looking for a good base for visiting Everglades, and this was perfect. A bit far out from all the attractions (Miami downtown, Miami Beach) but on the other hand it's cheaper and the quality of the room and personnel is high. At walking distance a mall with several shops. Good enough breakfast, clean, looked quite new and elegant, we choose it after reading the positive rating from Tripadvisor and we were very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: “Just one complaint.”
Reviews.Author: jeanpereira
Reviews.Content: Overall Comfort suites Miami was a preety nice experience. It is well located for shopping, driving around Miami and other florida cities nearby. I felt really confy with its large, clean and well furnished roons. The only complaint was about the breakfast, although there was a good variety of good, the restaurant was disappointingly small for alo guests. They need to change it really fast, or the reviews will soon change the good status this hotel acquired.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for the money - comfortable stay in Miami”
Reviews.Author: subbayya
Reviews.Content: Picked Comfort Suites based on reviews here. The suite hotel is well situated, with quick access to most highways. The best part was our interaction with staff - cheerful and ready to help, which was great. It is also an easy launching point to the Everglades or the Keys. In many cases you can bypass the toll roads once you get used to the street naming convention. The suite was clean and spacious. When we checked in - there was an issue with the air conditioner. We were given another room right away. The breakfast is nothing to write home about - but is ample and adequate. The lady there works dilligently keep the food trays topped up. The only issue we had was the softness of the matress. I personally dont like very soft mattress. The front desk has a list of good restuarants close by - ask for that and try out the different facilities.

Reviews.Title: “GET AWAY WEEKEND”
Reviews.Author: Xiomy1
Reviews.Content: We got away for the weekend and loved your place. It was close to publix supermarket, cvs pharmacy, places to eat and conveniently in front of the turnpike. The front desk was very friendly and always had a smile. It was nice to see the manager greeting us in the lobby early for breakfast. It felt more like a family environment then a hotel. Will come back.

Reviews.Title: “how can it be rated so high”
Reviews.Author: melon m
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel before Christmas 2011 and my decision was based on tripadvisor reviews.I still cannot understand why this hotel is rated so high.Yes it is good value for money, has helpful staff.free parking and free breakfast which was rather poor but that is where it all ends.. The rooms are nothing special and could do with a refurb .The pool is noisy due to nearby highwys.it is located quite far away from the beach and does not feel classy.I would not stay again..

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff and Service”
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey M
Reviews.Content: We come up from the Keys every month and I can't believe we missed out on this great place all these years, the staff is really nice, friendly with a good sense of humor, I talked to them a lot!....This was our first visit (Thanks TripAdvisor) but we will definitely become regulars. For those who commented on their location, well they are where they are!....Looking for great service without the $400 price tag?......Stay a this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Everything was a notch above the expected!”
Reviews.Author: Kleetampa
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel right off the Florida turnpike in South Miami. It was a 15-20 minute drive to the airboat rides in the Everglades and the Micosukee Indian area. I got a top-notch modern, clean, comfortable room, excellent service, and a great hot breakfast ... everything was the quality I'd expect from a room that cost almost twice as much in a City like Miami. The room had all the amenities... hairdryer, fridge, microwave, flat screen TV, free wi-fi that worked great, alarm clock, nice furniture, a couch and a huge comfy king-size bed. The room and hotel were very clean and everything was in great working order. The breakfast had all the usual cold hotel breakfast room food, plus hot eggs and meat, a waffle maker, an a good assortment of fresh fruits and yogurts. A worker kept everything fresh and full, and a manager was checking the breakfast room as well. The hotel is nestled in a shopping center that had a Publix grocery story, a CVS drugstore, a liquor store, a couple decent little sit-down restaurants, plus a couple fast food places. All you had to do was walk across the parking lot. Some reviews said the hotel was nothing special... but I say having everything be just right, plus a great location and a very attentive staff... makes it special indeed.

Reviews.Title: “Just Okay”
Reviews.Author: llongrider1
Reviews.Content: Stayed in a King bed room in October of 2011. There is nothing special about this hotel. It was clean, but I have stayed in over 5 different hotels in the Miami area in the past year and this was not worthy in my opinion of being rated #2 on the TA list. Breakfast was only fair even for a Comfort Suites. If you only require a clean room, in a safe location with no ambiance, you'll be happy.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you, tripadvisor”
Reviews.Author: eghack
Reviews.Content: Based on the reviews of tripadvisor, i booked this hotel to my trip to Miami with my wife. The Hotel is indeed great, and the review were very accurate. The rooms are well equiped, the furniture is new and everything is very clean. The staff is helpful. The location is fine, next to fast food (Burger King, Mcdonalds), a CVS and a Publix. Very easy to reach the highway, very convenient for drive around miami. The hotel has free parking and free internet, wich for me is a must nowadays. The prive is cheap compared with what the hotel offers. ItÂ´s also has vending and ice machines in all floors and coin laundry and dryer. A great hotel, good value.

Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: sokeen1
Reviews.Content: Lovely faciliity. Great staff. I have come to love choice hotels because of everything this hotel embodies. Clean, excellent and efficient staff, well appointed and the best pillows in the hotel world. Great stay!

Reviews.Title: “No wonder they are rated so highly........”
Reviews.Author: REBELJOHN
Reviews.Content: We stayed here after reading the many reviews of this hotel. Service was probably the best I have had in quite a while. Everyone was almost overly friendly. Breakfast was nice! They had 2 or 3 people working the area, so nothing ever ran out. When it did, it was quickly replenished. Staff made several great recommendations for close by restaurants. A small shopping center behind the hotel had everything we needed for our upcoming cruise.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place, Very Clean, Helpful Staff”
Reviews.Author: mrl56
Reviews.Content: We stay at this hotel every year and recommend it highly. The staff is friendly, professional and very helpful. Another good quality about this hotel is that it is very clean and well kept. Besides the normal breakfast items like cereal, this hotel has a waffle machine and a hot tray. Today they had scrambled eggs and sausage. The breakfast stays open until 10 AM, which is at least a half hour later than most hotels in this chain. This time we had to stay in a handicap room because I am on crutches with a broken foot. I was skeptical about staying in a handicap room because we had just left a MainStay hotel where the handicap room was terrible (we changed to a regular room). We were very pleased with the handicap room at this hotel. The shower was huge with a shower bench, hand held shower head and hand rails. Can't say enough good things about the place. It is a smoke free hotel.

Reviews.Title: “staying in Comfort Suites Miami/Kendall”
Reviews.Author: annie g
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights in this hotel. and enjoyed it very much. The breakfest was very good with much changes what to eat.;the room was clean and wel cleaned every day; the staff was friendly and helpfull when we had problems with our car; the bed was good, we slept very well. We recommandeed this hotel if you will stay in Miami. ;

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay at a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: Jim L
Reviews.Content: Greatly enjoyed our stay. Firstly the location is very convenient to highways North/South and East/West. Plus two major shopping centers are in close proximity, and a Publix and CVS are right behind the hotel. The premises are well maintained. The suite was very comfortable with two Queen beds, flat screen TV, and a seating area with couch and coffee table. The room had a small kitchen area with sink, frig, microwave, and, of course, a coffee maker. Bathroom was well appointed. Breakfast was one of the best I have seen in this type of hotel. Service was always with a smile, and none more so than Ernesto Vaca, Director of Sales & Marketing, who greeted us warmly each morning. I will definitely return. Jim Lawrie

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel- real Gem”
Reviews.Author: Don G
Reviews.Content: Well kept and a very pleasant staff that exudes customer service. Have stayed in many of the Choice hotels and this is far and away the best . We had a room with a half wall division that had a love seat and chair but still was an easy viewing distance fro the flat panel TV. And Ernesto its manager could not do enough to aswer our area questions.

Reviews.Title: “Our usual haunt”
Reviews.Author: menmarty
Reviews.Content: We visit family in Miami once a year and, despite having tried other hotels, we always come back to this one. It is very centrally located, it is clean and spacious, and it is not too pricey. The beds are very comfortable and there is an area with a couch and coffee table that is good for eating meals. The walls are thin, though, so don't stay in a room near the elevator or the conference room. It suited our purpose well and has for about 5 years now. We will be back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: HonuNole
Reviews.Content: Quiet, clean and great location with reasonable prices. Great beds and excellent staff. Enjoyed the visit.

Reviews.Title: “great comfort, excellent service, wonderful prices”
Reviews.Author: Judith R
Reviews.Content: I have been traveling with groups frequently to Miami for the past 2 1\2 years. I always stay with Comfort suites Miami Kendal because they give a personalized, warm service, and they are CLEAN!. They offer great prices and are flexible to our group's needs. The rooms are comfortable for 4. The breakfast is included and is better than even other Comfort Suites I've stayed at. I love it, I first went with eight people two years ago and just returned from staying with them with a group of 20! Excellent service all of the time.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Family Time in Miami”
Reviews.Author: Misty S
Reviews.Content: My family of 3, myself, my husband, and my two-year old son had a great time visiting Miami and staying at the Comfort Suites. It was our first visit to Miami and we wanted to stay outside of the main touristy areas since we had our son with us. The hotel was very clean and the service was outstanding. The complimentary breakfast had an ample variety of items and kept everyone satisfied. We didn't get an opportunity to use the pool; however, I did make use of the fitness room and though small, it had three cardio machines in addition to a weight machine and was enough for a workout room on vacation. There is a shopping area within walking distance that has several dining options. We had a really nice stay and would return again.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC HOTEL!!!”
Reviews.Author: Turtle T
Reviews.Content: This hotel was one of the best experiences I've ever had in a hotel. It was wonderful being there. The staff at the hotel is the best staff I've ever dealt with. They're personable, caring, friendly, and informative throughout my stay. The rooms are top notch, spotless, and highly affordable for such a prime location! I would recommend this hotel to anyone I know. I will absolutely go back and am already looking forward towards my next stay. I can't express how great the experience was.

Reviews.Title: “Service”
Reviews.Author: charles8100
Reviews.Content: My family and I were extremely satisfied with the excellent customer service that this hotel offers, this is our first time in this commodity, and we are having such as good time that we decided to stay one day more and we will be coming here all the time that we visit Miami. I have to mention overall the kitchen service, Ms Eva Aroca is an excellent attendant, everything was on place and she was smiling and willing to help everybody, a really nice person to keep around.. Thank you for the cozy place you manage here.... Charles

Reviews.Title: “"Great Hotel"”
Reviews.Author: Jeannie T
Reviews.Content: Each and every time my family and I visit Miami this is were we stay because of the great customer service, clean and comfortable rooms, nice private pool/hot tub and their free breakfast. All the times I have stayed here I have yet to find one thing wrong.

Reviews.Title: “I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS HOTEL!”
Reviews.Author: Maria R
Reviews.Content: Hello, Firstly, I am an extremely picky person about what hotels I stay at!! I use to work in one back in my days. If I don't like the atmosphere to begin with I walk right out! I found the Comfort Suites Miami/Kendall to be quite charming upon entering. Had a home away from home feel to it. I was greeted very friendly by the staff. We had a 3 night stay in August. I do not know why there were off reviews on this hotel. As someone who has done this industry before I do know sometimes guests can be needless to say not so nice. The Comfort Suites Staff was super friendly, Ernesto, Rafaela, Tulio, Michelle, Xiomara. I can go on and on. They were all super nice with us. Being greeted in the mornings and coming in/out of the hotel for a hotel that is not a "Five Star" hotel it's quite impressive! Rooms were very well kept and housekeeping definitely does there job! Breakfast was very good, it's not the Four Season's ladies and gents so it is what it is! But all in all, it's got a pleasant variety and well balanced for everyone's needs! I cannot rave enough about this place and I will always come back to my second home Comfort Suites Miami/Kendall when I am in the area. Thank you to all and keep up the excellent work!!!

Reviews.Title: “Was pretty comfortable...”
Reviews.Author: angica03
Reviews.Content: I truly enjoyed the 5 days stay at this hotel. I liked the buffet style breakfast and made your own pancakes. Swimming its swimming pool was really refreshing after a day of seminar and 30-40 minutes walk back to the hotel. Their internet service was great and I could keep in touch with my clients even though I was away for 5 days. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who needs inner city accommodation in Miami, Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Not up to the rave reviews”
Reviews.Author: Kenn47
Reviews.Content: I stayed here mid-September, based on its #2 rating by fellow Trip Advisor reviews. It was just ok, nothing special. Perhaps the reviews set my expectations too high. It was clean, easy to get to, but mostly bland and forgetable. I agreed with those who said the breakfast was poor; but that seems to be standard fare these days - although there were fresh cooked scrambled eggs. What surprised me was at check out, I received neither a good morning nor a thank you for your business. The clerk handed me my receipt and walked away without a word. Bad customer relations.

Reviews.Title: “Good location for us; breakfast poor”
Reviews.Author: johnybegud
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel for two nights only, as we had arranged an airboat tour nearby (subsequently cancelled due to weather). We had just arrived after a fabulous 8 days in Grand Cayman so hope this review isn't tainted by the weather we found in Miami! Other reasons for booking this hotel was the free wi-fi and breakfast. Wi-fi for us was great (2nd floor) but breakfast was truly awful! There is VERY limited selection. First morning only hot food was scrambled egg - with ham slices available. Next morning was hard boiled eggs with bacon. There is a waffle maker you can use, a small selection of cereals (3) and fruit juices. It is very basic. And all this is served on disposable plates, with plastic cutlery. But... the room was large, clean and comfortable. We had little interaction with staff, but seemed ok. There is a small kitchenette area in the room (which we didn't use). They have a pool, which was being used by others even in the rain. There is an excellent little family run Italian restaurant (Nunzio's) across the parking lot which should be tried wherever you stay in Miami! In summary - rooms good, clean, nice size. Don't stay there just for the offer of free breakfast!

Reviews.Title: “We were simply at home.”
Reviews.Author: Jitka H
Reviews.Content: Dear Friends, Last month (July) I visited Florida and stayed some days in hotel Comfort Suites in Miami, Kendall. This hotel was recommended us by Visitor Centre. It was our first trip to USA, but we have been travelling a lot by all Europe and partly Asia, so we have some experience. We were accommodated in some 5 Florida hotels before, so we have possibility to compare them.After only one day and night in this hotel we decided to cancel our plans and no travel anywhere else, simply stay in the best hotel of all . And do you ask me why? There was everything we needed in one place in this hotel. Good nice and clean accommodation, really suitable, good service, pool, PC room, Fit room, good way equiped room and specially nice and good people -staff, open and all the time ready to help and give an advice . So I felt , that I return from our trips not to hotel, but simply I went home.I was a bit sad to leave this nice place, where every morning kind and keep smilling Mr. Ernesto J. Vaca , wished me and other quests to enjoy our breakfast and have a nice day. And the breakfast service waited to last guest, not closing during eating . I felt, that it was really over duties of common personal, when I wanted to buy some souvenirs , which I couldnÂ´t manage to discover enywhere and I was with great style given by the exceptional man. As I know all my life, everything is in people and their behaviour to us and I met a lot of good people there, in USA . But I know, that if I ever visit this part of the Earth, the only hotel I will be in is COMFORT SUITES MIAMI KENDALL. So thank you a lot again. Jitka HodulÃ­kovÃ¡ Ostrava Czech Republic- Europe

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in good location”
Reviews.Author: plysobey
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel recently based on Tripadvisor reviews. It was an excellent choice for travelling around south Miami, the Keys and the Everglades. It is also only a half hour drive to Key Biscayne or SoBe.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Stay...Very Clean and Comfortable:)”
Reviews.Author: DarwinL
Reviews.Content: My family and I were staying in Miami prior to cruising to the Bahamas. I am usually very picky about hotels and I always look for reviews before I stay in them. Rooms have to be clean, comfortable and upgraded. This hotel met all of my expectations: from guest services, dining/breakfast, to room decor and furniture. The cleaning staff ..spoke little English but were still very kind and helpful. This property is in great condition and well managed. I absolutely enjoyed my two day stay here. In addition, this hotel is within walking distance to local drug and grocery store. Also, there are shopping stores nearby, which is an added bonus for those traveling with children. Again, a great place to stay if you are visiting Miami, Florida!!

Reviews.Title: “The Best Bang For The Buck In Miami...!”
Reviews.Author: Cinnaman61
Reviews.Content: This Hotel has been renovated, extremely clean and staff is very proper. The Security is very good and it offers a nice quick Hot Breakfast every morning. You can't go bad...

Reviews.Title: “Best Kept Secret Chain Hotel”
Reviews.Author: enrique h
Reviews.Content: If you dont have a clue where you are or where to stay when you go to Miami, or if you are tired after a loong hard drive on the Florida Turnpike, or if you are going to Key West and this is a mandatory rest, make sure you use this hotel. Outstanding location right next to the turnpike on the Bird road exit, easy smooth check in services, nice fresh and clean rooms and the staff is wonderful. I would like to point out the hotel is 10 minutes from all major malls. The General Manager Mr. Espinal and the Director of Sales Mr. Vaca make a great team for this hotel. Both were extremely helpful with our needs and you feel they go out of their way to service their guests. Breakfast good and well serviced (my expectations weren't high) because I'm aware it is limited service. They have a good operation and the value is right for the price. Thanks guys for a great stay. We will repeat and recommend.

Reviews.Title: “repeat customer”
Reviews.Author: Jose U
Reviews.Content: always happy with pool & hot tub, my priority. Bfats is nice, waffle iron works. Beds are comfy. Location okay just off 836 that gets you to Miami beach in 45 min.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Personal Service I Ever Had”
Reviews.Author: Jay Rosen R
Reviews.Content: We booked the Comfort Suites for it's location. What a surprise! The rooms were clean and adequate, the breakfast was a full breakfast and was plentiful. The service was 5 star! Everyone was so polite and understanding, you could tell the staff was very well trained. We stayed 3 nights and a gentleman by the name of Ernesto (I am not sure of his position) was everywhere we turned. He was so helpful, greeted us every morning, asked how our stay was and if their was anything he could do, he even offered us a late checkout at no charge! His attitude certainly has rubbed off on the rest of the staff. Because of him we will definitely be back and recommend this hotel to our friends traveling to the Miami area. My wife wanted to stay in South Beach, but this was great! Congratulations to the Comfort Suites origination.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service & very professional”
Reviews.Author: Adolfo C
Reviews.Content: Excellent accommodations, friendly atmosphere, and professional staff. The general manager (Tulio) was very attentive to our needs and with the help of the Sales Director (Ernesto) we were able to conduct our business meetings effectively. Good value for your money.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, excellent. excellent”
Reviews.Author: Peter D
Reviews.Content: Excellent management especially Tulio Espinal and Ernesto Vaca. Housekeeping superb.. So helpful and courteous, it might be a Comgort Inn but the service, amenities and cleanliness was 10 star plus plus.

Reviews.Title: “Great General Manager & Staff”
Reviews.Author: AutoTechbmw
Reviews.Content: My family and I have been staying at this lovely hotel since 2004. I've had the pleasure of knowing Mr. Espinal the General Manager since my first trip back in 2004, he is a true hospitality professional, whenever you see an employee they greet you with a smile and a "hello", Mr. Vaca the director of sales is always there at the lobby greeting you and asking how is everything, I used to stay a much pricier hotels, not anymore, the Comfort Suites is our home away from home. Keep up good the work Mr. Espinal & Staff.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, great hotel, great staff!!”
Reviews.Author: sunboy311
Reviews.Content: I have been partial to the choice hotels for a while now because of there great choice privileges benefits...I have stayed at this particular hotel several times. The location is perfect for a lot of the business trips I take to that area. I have received great service there...the staff is always very friendly and courteous. The rooms are always very clean, and I usually prefer a hotel with a fitness room as this one does. Overall, this hotel meets my needs very well!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Property with Authentic Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: Chef_Bill_JW81
Reviews.Content: I've been staying here when in Miami over the past 7 Years, the location is well suited for business just off the FL Turnpike @ Bird Road AKA 40th street. Clean Comfortable rooms with plenty of space to relax as well as get some work done. Ernesto is the Classic Gentleman and is there every morning to Greet Every Guest as they come off the elevator and into the lobby for Breakfast. The balance of the staff shares his Old World Hospitality Style, something only found in pricier hotels and not often in this country. Great Job!

Reviews.Title: “I will come back”
Reviews.Author: mariocl
Reviews.Content: the hotel is the turnpike highwat and 40 th st. Which in a convenient location for my Miami visit. Cleanliness of accomodations and good attention from the personnel made my stay a very pleasent one. I strongly suggest to stay at the confort suites near kendall.

Reviews.Title: “A great find”
Reviews.Author: bwml
Reviews.Content: My company put me here for 3 nights and I was extremely pleased. I arrived late at night and the guy that checked me in was really great, such a friendly welcome. The other people working there were super as well, even the maid cleaning the rooms seemed to smile and say hello. The breakfast was excellent as well. The location is not great for people who want a beach vacation but for those who are in the area on business this hotel is probably as good as you will hope to find.

Reviews.Title: “Okay”
Reviews.Author: barnhok
Reviews.Content: This is listed as a Miami hotel, but it is south and inland (technically in Kendall)...quite far from downtown or the beach. We chose it because it was in between South Beach and the Keys and we didn't want to pay for a Miami hotel after coming in from our cruise, before heading down to Key Largo the next day. There was plenty of room for our family (we need 3 beds because our teenagers are a boy and a girl), but it was nothing special. The a/c was having a hard time keeping up with the extreme humidity but kept us cool. Our room was quiet although the beds were too soft for my taste. It was in good shape and our TV was so new that they didn't have a remote that worked with it initially. But housekeeping didn't give us enough towels and left a dirty washcloth in the shower. There was some variety at breakfast (cold cereal, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, toast and hot dishes like microwave eggs and sausage) but nothing was very good and we ended up getting breakfast out. The parking lot merged into a parking lot with a strip mall and medical center; I wasn't sure how safe it was but we didn't have any problems. Everyone was nice and it wasn't a bad place to stay, but it was not really near anything either. For our purposes, it was fine, but if we had intended to stay in Miami, we would have been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: Mosleys
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Comfort Suites, Miami for ten days while my son was in the hospital for surgery. We were very impressed with all aspects of our stay at this Comfort Suites. The hotel was super clean with all the ammenities we could ask for. Everyone was very kind and helpful, especially Mr. Ernesto Vaca. Mr. Vaca,on behalf of the hotel, sent us a delicious fruit basket and card with a nice message of best wishes in the recuperation of our son. This meant a lot to us, especially since we were so far away from home and family in Mississippi. We will definitely stay here again when we are in the area for medical reasons or vacationing. Thank you for a most pleasant stay and for making a tough time a little easier by your kindness and attention to details. Lamar and Dianna Mosley and family

Reviews.Title: “We had a great time - plan to go back!”
Reviews.Author: sbwag71
Reviews.Content: We went to this hotel based on reviews we had read about it. They were spot on! The staff was WONDERFUL, the rooms were very comfortable. There was a breakfast every morning which we all enjoyed. We were greeted by the managers who always asked how our night was and if we slept okay! The beds were so comfortable as well. Nice pool and spa and in a shopping center with Publix, CVS, Burger King, KFC, BBQ place, Gas station - you won't need to go far! Overall can't say enough about how pleased we were!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful, and a great bargain to boot!”
Reviews.Author: KTC-NewEngland(CT)
Reviews.Content: I am skeptical of budget hotels, but wanted a hotel close enough to the airport for our final night after finishing a week in the Florida Keys. This one was well reviewed on TripAdvisor and was a great price. It had nice decor, pleasant grounds, helpful and friendly staff and a well done bedroom. No complaints! A/C was as cold as we wanted, The room was clean, beds and pillows were nice and breakfast had hot eggs available. We would stay again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Comfortable, Convenient”
Reviews.Author: CVJW66
Reviews.Content: I was in Miami for training, and bypassed other hotels closer to my class to stay here - based on Trip Advisor recommendations. I was not disappointed. It was more than suitable for my needs. While I wish it was closer to the airport, the fact that there was a distance probably helps keep the quality higher. And it was right off the expressway, so getting to/from the airport was pretty direct. One other preference would be a larger swimming pool. I swim laps for exercise and this was more of a family wading pool than a place to work out. I asked at the desk and they could not direct me to an olympic pool nearby at which to work out. Complimentary breakfast buffet changed slightly daily, which I thought was a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: “Love this hotel best I have ever stayed in!”
Reviews.Author: Crystal0806
Reviews.Content: This hotel is so nice and in perfect location in miami. The pool and hot tub are outside surrounded by palm trees and quite. Its near shopping, great reseraunts, beach and everything else. The room and hotel was so clean and comfortable. It is a little pricy for not being right on the beach, but it is Miami. Overall I love it and stay everytime I go back to Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Yet Another Accurate Set Of Reviews Through TripAdvisor”
Reviews.Author: barbarawalshtravel
Reviews.Content: We have just stayed at Comfort Suites Kendall at 3901 SW 117th Ave, Miami. We had been initially hoping for a suitable place to stay in or around Miami Beach, but were unable to find anywhere that combined a reasonable cost with the services we were looking for. As a result, we went back to TripAdvisor to search for a suitable accommodation venue. We were looking for a suites based hotel offering complimentary wireless internet , free parking, breakfast and with reported good service from staff. The Comfort Suites hotel at Kendall met all of these requirements, and was able to offer an excellent deal. They offered a "stay 4, pay 3" package on their own website, and we were able to take advantage of this discounted rate fro our 6 night stay. Our experience at the hotel was excellent. Interactions with all staff were friendly and professional, yet courteous. We would not have any hesitation in recommending this hotel to anyone who is looking for a stay in Miami, and doensn't feel the need to locate at Miami Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay in Miami”
Reviews.Author: rams2050
Reviews.Content: After trying to find a good hotel on the Miami beachfront -- and failing to find one that didn't charge exorbitantly for parking -- we relied on our old standby, Comfort Suites. We found one on 117th Avenue, and it turned out to be one of the finest hotels we have ever stayed at -- even rivaling those that cost us upwards of $400 per night. The manager, Senor Ernesto Vaca, aims to please and will go the extra mile for any guest. The desk attendants are courteous and helpful and they, too, will do whatever it takes to help guests out. The person responsible for the breakfast, Senora Eva, puts out one of the finest breakfasts anyone could reasonably expect of a hotel -- hot eggs, sausage or bacon, a variety of breads and bagels, lots of different cereals, fruits, yogurt, Danish, flavored creamers, waffles, coffee, four different juices. In short, you name it and you've got it at this hotel. Plus, the rooms are impeccably clean and extremely quite. TWO elevators mean you rarely wait to go upstairs or down. In short, a very fine hotel run by an extremely wonderful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Would go back again”
Reviews.Author: ktstrickland
Reviews.Content: We just needed a hotel for one night as we were in Miami taking in a couple of the attractions. This hotel was fantastic, so pretty! The rooms were clean and comfy. Hotel staff was very helpful and so friendly. The breakfast in the morning was typical Choice hotel breakfast but a nice room to eat in. The pool outside is nice and closed in to others from the outside, and the workout room was great too. The only issue we had was we had an adjoining room and the person on the other side was nasty, we heard all his conversations and he didn't have clean language we wanted our children to here and then come 7:30am he was hacking up a lung and I thought I was going to vomit so I had to turn my tv on to drown out the sound it was aweful. Over all great experience and would go back again. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “It's OK. Nothing special.”
Reviews.Author: bluecrash
Reviews.Content: Stayed while in Miami on business for 5 days. Nothing special. Was OK. Older TV in some rooms, others have flat screens. Wireless is sporatic within hotel, was not existent on the 5th floor. Complained about server for 5 days, never fixed. Pool was OK. Breakfasts had decent selection.

Reviews.Title: “Well maintained clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Starviagera
Reviews.Content: This is a very well maintained property and the kind of place I expect from this chain but not always get. The room was clean with good amentias and clean linens, it also had a refrigerator, microwave, a breakfast table, a couch, laundry facilities and good continental buffet. Central to the 2 places we wanted to see the Fairchild Gardens and the Everglades.

Reviews.Title: “Like it !”
Reviews.Author: Denellelone
Reviews.Content: We went to Miami for 2 nights only and found this place. Everything in this place was very clean, spotless and the room also provide soft, comfortable beds. I like the fact that the hotel offer you free internet. The staff are not many, but all of them were very friendly. No regret at all.

Reviews.Title: “Great spot on your way to the Everglades/Keys”
Reviews.Author: bobalcorn5
Reviews.Content: We stopped for one night on our way to the Everglades and Key West after flying into Miami. We picked it out of the blue, knowing nothing about the neighborhood. Turns out this is a beautiful hotel right off the Florida Turnpike. We were greeted by two young night clerks (one named Michelle) who registered us promptly and directed us to Sergio's restaurant when I asked about Cuban food. They couldn't have been more helpful! The room was clean and spacious; the pool looked inviting; and the breakfast was complete with eggs, sausage, waffles, fruit, cereal pastries, etc. Two of the managers were present at breakfast and greeted us and asked about our stay. I would highly recommend this to anyone, especially if you are headed out of town on your trip, and don't want the hassle of paying Miami Beach prices.

Reviews.Title: “Great Price for the Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ARS819
Reviews.Content: I only stayed at this hotel for one night. Complimentry shuttle from the airport. The gym is very small but at least I used it. The offered free complimentry breakfast of pastry, fruit and cereal.

Reviews.Title: “Nice people”
Reviews.Author: pedsfs
Reviews.Content: Got stuck in Miami and had to stay the night. The room was nice and clean, a bit old but well-kept. But they have a great business center with fast free internet, no password required, already connected to a printer and ready to go. The desk clerk was superhelpful and I was able to get un-stuck from Miami in no time. Nice place for business travel.

Reviews.Title: “very positive experience”
Reviews.Author: crispes
Reviews.Content: when we first came off the turnpike onto SW 40th St. (Bird Rd.) our first impressions were not positive due to a man walking up to car windows trying to sell packs of Skittles. However we learned that first impressions are not always true. This motel is in an excellent location with good safe neighborhoods around it & friendly people. Very good location if you want to explore the everglades. Florida International University & the National Weather Service Miami Branch are within walking distance. Staff was very friendly & rooms were as clean as can be. One of the best A/C Units we have experienced with the temperature getting down to 47! The only thing I did not like was that Wireless Internet was very slow at best and most times would not connect at all. Property is very well maintained with a nice swimming pool & Bushes all around for privacy. Great location with Publix grocery store, Leon Medical center & post Office all within walking distance. Great stay, would definitly stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Comfort Suites-Miami Kendall - Great Choice”
Reviews.Author: Pipcosta
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Comfort Suites-Miami Kendall from the 11th of March to the 15th. It is perfect for our needs. Good location for visiting stores and sites. Very clean and well maintained. Spacious comfortable room. Good free parking. Reasonable continental breakfast. Reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: elroyalblue
Reviews.Content: I don't have one bad thing to say about this hotel. Staff was very helpful, quick on bringing up extra towels or whatever we needed. Upon entering everything was very clean, spotless. Soft, comfortable beds with lots of pillows. Nice little kitchenette with microwave and fridge, sink. Bring your own drinks and food to warm up and put in the fridge to save some money. Breakfast was delicious, great setup with alot of choices. Had a great time in the pool. Turnipke is right there, and lots of choices to go eat nearby, and of course the bakeries are my favorite. I will indeed stay here all the time!!! Emily in Jacksonville, FL

Reviews.Title: “Safe bet - excellent value.”
Reviews.Author: AWessen
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel for 3 nights. Family of five with adjoining rooms - excellent. Staff very helpful and friendly. Breakfast basic but good quality. Rooms very clean and in good order. Rooms and hotel very quiet, even though next to a main, busy area. Aircon in all rooms. Would stay again. Cost very good value.

Reviews.Title: “Best Value in Miami (Kendall)”
Reviews.Author: rapbtp
Reviews.Content: I decided it was time for me to review the Comfort Suites in Kendall. I have stayed at this property many times on business and keep coming back. This is an extremely well run hotel that has won the "Platinum award" from it's parent company, Choice Hotels, for several years running. (only about 5% of their properties get this recognition) It is clean clean clean on the inside and out. The staff is great, and the beds are high quality. Many of my colleagues stay at the much more expensive Dadeland Marriott. I choose to save about $50 a night and have a much easier time parking. I highly recommend this hotel to business travelers or anyone else looking for a great value.

Reviews.Title: “not bad!”
Reviews.Author: landlockedinIL
Reviews.Content: For the area, this was ok for the price. The rooms were clean, but with a few stains. The outside pool was heated, but right next to the main road, separated only by a few shrubs that don't cut the noise. So, all you hear is traffic while swimming. The hotel was decorated ok, but the adjoining rooms convey sounds between the doors pretty well. If you go, try to stay next to someone you know, so you can tell them when to turn off the TV so you can sleep. The staff weren't very helpful, we had to wait a half hour & make three requests for towels. But, there were no bugs or anything, so I had a decent stay. It's worth it if you get a discounted price and plan to spend your time away from the hotel. If you want to stay somewhere that you can hang around the area, look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ondrums
Reviews.Content: Vacation stay 2/15 through 2/18. Very good hotel. No complaints. Very clean; staff very gracious. Received 2 for 1 nights during promotion. Right off turnpike. Easy access to main highways. Close to shopping centers. Great pool and excersise room. DSL service, continental breakfast. Will definitely stay again
